name: Aravinay
desc: Un Aranara che si trova a Mahavanaranapna. In cambio di nuove storie, otterrai da Aravinay dei progetti per la forgia.

customize.name: Storia del re della foresta
customize.desc:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the claymore "Forest Regalia."

This tale is about the Forest King.

"The forest used to be a giant maze many, many moons ago..."

customize.name: Racconti di te insieme agli Aranara
customize.desc: So many wonderful things transpired during your adventures with the Aranara. In the world of the Aranara where stories are highly valued, maybe someone is willing to "exchange" these with you.

customize.name: Storia del deserto
customize.desc:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the sword "Sapwood Blade."

This tale is about a friend lost in the desert.

"This is a story from Valuka..."

customize.name: Racconti di te insieme agli Aranara
customize.desc: So many wonderful things transpired during your adventures with the Aranara. In the world of the Aranara where stories are highly valued, maybe someone is willing to "exchange" these with you.

customize.name: Storia dello scudiere del re
customize.desc:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the Bow "King's Squire."

This tale is about a girl lost in the forest maze.

"Once upon a time, there was a princess..."

customize.name: Storia del chiaro di luna
customize.desc:
Grazie a questa storia imparerai come realizzare la lancia Trafiggiluna.

È la storia del chiaro di luna e della magia.
"La storia di tutti i ragazzini affascinati dal chiaro di luna..."

customize.name: Storia del prodigio
customize.desc:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the catalyst "Fruit of Fulfillment."

This tale is about portents and disasters.

"In truth, the moon did not always look like a pearl..."
